positive_examples: This dataset overrepresents certain groups while underrepresenting others.
The examples systematically skew toward one demographic.
Minority perspectives are largely absent from this training data.
The framing consistently favors one viewpoint.
Selection bias has shaped what information is included.
negative_examples: This sample is representative of the underlying population.
The data collection was designed to be balanced.
The selection criteria were applied uniformly.
Efforts were made to include diverse viewpoints.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects awareness of representation imbalance versus assuming balance. Key markers: overrepresents, underrepresents, skew, absent, systematically favors.

definition: A signal indicating systematic distortions in how information or groups are depicted.
